body_html: That stackoverflow is interesting, but the comment which suggests not using sudo pip install does not suggest a solution that works for all users globally. That is one reason that sudo pip install could be preferred.
body_text: That stackoverflow is interesting, but the comment which suggests not using sudo pip install does not suggest a solution that works for all users globally. That is one reason that sudo pip install  could be preferred.
